WACR001-d-12-04-84-WACR.Narrative: THE PURPOSE OF THIS REPORT IS TO INFORM THE FRA OF AN INCIDENT/ACCIDENT THAT OCCURED ON THIS RAILROAD'S LINE ON DEC 4,1984. SINCE THERE WERE NO RAILROAD EMPLOYEES AND NO RAILROAD EQUIPMENT INVOLVED, THIS NARRATIVE IS SUPPLIED TO CLARIFY INFORMATION ON THE FORM WHICH IS SOMEWHAT INADEQUATE FOR THE SITUATION. THE BOMBARDIER CORP, A FREIGHT CUSTOMER OF THIS RAILROAD IS A MANUFACTURER OF RAILWAY PASSENGER CARS. IN ADDITION TO DELIVERY OF THEIR FINISHED CARS, OUR CREW AND EQUIPMENT ARE OCCASIONALLY CALLED UPON TO SWITCH THEIR CARS FROM ONE PRIVATE SIDING TO ANOTHER AT THE PLANT. ON THE DAY OF THE INCIDENT, INDUSTRY PERSONNEL WERE PERFORMING SUCH A SWITCH WITH THEIR OWN EQUIPMENT AS THEY FREQUENTLY DO. IN THE PROCESS, A NEARLY COMPLETED CAR WAS TEMPORARILY PLACED ON OUR MAIN LINE ON SLOPED GRADE, JUST BEYOND THE INDUSTRY SWITCH. ACCORDING TO BOMBARDIER OFFICIALS, THE WHEELS WERE CHOCKED, BUT DUE TO ICY CONDITIONS, THE CHOCKS DID NOT HOLD THE CAR. IT ROLLED DOWN OUR MAIN LINE UNATTENDED, GAINED SPEED, TRAVELLED APPROX 1.28 MI FROM THE PLANT AND DERAILED IN A WOODED AREA. WACR SUSTAINED MINOR DAMAGE, BUTTHE BOMBARDIER CAR (VALUED AT $1000000) WAS HEAVILY DAMAGED.NoneNoneNone

184-d-12-05-84-OCTR.Narrative: CREW LEFT CUT OF 16 CARS STANDING ON GRADE ON MAIN TRACK 1/4 MILE ABOVE INTERCHANGE TRACK. THESE CARS WERE LEFT HERE IN ORDER TO CLEAR INTERCHANGE TRACK PRIOR TO INTERCHANGE. THE CREW MADE AN EMERGENGY BRAKE APPLICATION ON THE STANDING CUT OF CARS, BUT FAILED TO SET ANY HAND BRAKES. THE CREW THEN MOVED THE LIGHT ENGINE DOWN ONTO THE INTERCHANGE TRACK, COUPLED ON TO 18 CARS AND STARTED TO INSPECT THESE CARS. AFTER APPROXIMATELY 15 MINUTES, THE STANDING CUT OF CARS DRIFTED DOWN THE GRADE AND STRUCK THE ENGINE AND CARS STANDING ON THE INTERCHANGE TRACK. THE LOCOMOTIVE, ONE LOADED CAR, AND ONE EMPTY CAR IN THE STANDING CUT WERE DERAILED, AND ONE EMPTY CAR IN THE DRIFTING CUT WAS DERAILED.A SUBSEQUENT INVESTIGATION SHOWED THAT THE CARS THAT DRIFTED DOWN THE GRADE ALL HELD A FULL EMERGENCY APPLICATION FOR 60 MINUTES AFTER MAKING THE APPLICATION. THE CAUSE OF THIS ACCIDENT IS DETERMINED TO BE LEAVING A CUT OF CARS STANDING ON A GRADE WITHOUT SETTING HANDBRAKES, WITH A CONTRIBUTING CAUSE OF VANDALS RELEASING THE AIR BRAKES BY PULLING THE RELEASE RODS.NoneNoneNoneNone
